summary: Completed comprehensive testing of updated Padel Center website with dark theme design. All core functionality working correctly including booking flow, API integration, UI components, and mobile responsiveness.
passed_tests: All 7 backend API endpoints working (100% success rate)
Hero section with dark theme, pink accents, and white CTA button
Info badges (инфо-плашки) displaying correctly in hero section
Why Padel section with 3 pink cards working
For Who section with 4 white cards on dark background
Process section with 4 step-by-step blocks
Formats section with 5 game format cards and booking buttons
Pricing section with 3 tariff plans (central pink featured plan)
Atmosphere section with photos and social links (WhatsApp, Telegram)
Statistics section displaying rating (4.9), players (1247+), games (234+)
Final CTA section with pink background and white button
Footer with contacts and 'Ask question' button
Booking modal opens from all 8 entry points (Hero, Navigation, Why Try, Persona cards, Format cards, Pricing, Final CTA, Footer)
Complete booking flow working: date selection → time selection → contact form → successful submission
Success message displays: 'Вы успешно записались! Ждём вас на игру!'
Mobile responsiveness working correctly
Mobile menu functionality working
Mobile booking flow working
All sections scroll properly on mobile
Dark theme (#0A0A0A background) implemented correctly
Pink accents (#FF007F) used throughout design
Navigation smooth scrolling to sections working
Calendar integration with API schedule data
Format-specific booking with pre-selected options
Form validation and error handling working
